text: movun (deviyan yayi) ārādhanā karana dæyada (taman venuven) tamangē deviyan veta mædihat vī katā kirīmaṭa (deviyan veta) samīpava siṭinnē kavarekdæyi yanna soyāgena, ohugē dayāvama balāporottuven siṭimin, ohugē dan̆ḍuvamaṭada biya vannāha. mandayat niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyangē dan̆ḍuvama nam, itāmat biya vannaṭa yutu ekaki
